text: we talked about selectors in CSS and we said that selectors are used to select any element on which style is going to be applied now we can apply style on different elements and how to select those elements for example, element with an id, element with a class we can target an element by its name and we can also decide that if a particular element is in a particular element then only the styling is applied I will explain the rules of applying styling in this video and I will explain the selectors to you if you are enjoying this course then do write sigma bach on the comment box below we have to maintain this high energy throughout the course I want to give you a heads up that this video is very important this is a very important video of CSS so increase your excitement let's go to the computer screen let's roll the intro I am in the computer screen now and the first thing I am going to do is to create a video 17 folder and I will call video 17 CSS as one of the most important videos because if you understand how selectors work then your work will be very easy so I will create a folder called video 17 index.html and I am going to use the internal CSS style sheet so that you can see how I am doing and I will do a lot of things here I will turn on word wrap, screencast mode so that you can see whatever button I press and I will write CSS selectors here and I will create a div here and I have simply created a div here I am a div guys if you haven't accessed it yet then do play list of sigma web development and all the source codes are getting updated so you shouldn't have any tension in that regard now I am going to do a very simple thing I will preview this first and I want to make the background of this div red now you might be wondering why I want to make the background red because I want to see how much space this div is taking so I want to make it red so I will simply give the background red so I will give a style tag to this div so I will give the background color red and this is our property and value I will tell you about other properties and values but for now you can understand that this is property and value so what I have done here is element selector so I will write element selector here and I will comment this CSS comments are written like this forward slash star and whatever we write in the middle of the bar are comments in CSS so I have put a CSS comment that this is element selector so the background is red so this was our element selector another basic selector now element selector that I have made what are its drawbacks the moment I add another div here so the background of this div will also get red and you might not want to make the background red so if you don't want to make the background red then you will definitely use another selector and you will want to use a specific selector so I can tell you that where class is red, just make the div red so I have made class is equal to red and because I have made class is equal to red you will get to see what I have done here if I write .red and after that if I make the background color red and I don't want the div to get red so I will show you that only this div will get red as you can see here so that's why I have used class selector so this is our class selector I will write class selector and the next selector that I am going to tell you is ID selector and you might have guessed it by listening to the ID selector so I want to make the ID with the hashtag red or let's do one thing let's make an ID with the hashtag green and if I write background color green so wherever I write ID green it will get green now you can see here this is our I am another div it doesn't have any background color but as soon as I show you ID green I will write I will give this ID green and you can see that in the ID of the div background color is green so this is our ID selector it was very simple let's make things simple now I will tell you what child selector is and the source code will work for your notes so what is child selector if I want the paragraph in a div to get blue so I will say the color of the paragraph in the div should be blue and what should be the background color let's say background color should be brown so if I put a paragraph in any div I am a para inside div so this child selector will be applied because this paragraph is child of div and I have said if any paragraph of div is child so what will happen background color will be brown and color will be blue as simple as that now I will show you one thing if I wrap this whole thing in a div actually I will not do div I will use it as main element or I will use it as article tag so now this is not a paragraph in div this is a paragraph in article so this property will not be applied I will show you this property will not be applied because this selector means if I am a direct child in div then this selector will be applied or else it will not be applied here this direct child is not there if I am an article in div then this is a p this is not a direct child in div but if I want if any paragraph is a descendant of div then this property will be applied then what will I do then I have another way so what will I do I will use descendant selector and what is descendant selector we write descendant selector like this I will write div, space and p I am saying p should be in div no matter who is writing it whether it is in div, article, main, footer p should be in div in some form or another then it will be applied so you can see here that this property is applied again but when I talk about child selector child selector should be applied when it is a direct child I hope you are getting the sense now there is another universal selector it means I want to give all elements a margin of 0 and padding of 0 if I write p0 then I can write padding 0 through emet it means all elements have margin 0 so I am done here earlier we had margin of padding which was given by default by Google chrome but now this margin of padding is over as you have seen I hope you have understood this now there are many types of selector but these are the most used now I will tell you about more selector in upcoming videos but these are the ones with which we will develop our web so I don't want to confuse you and you won't be able to learn so I want you to pay attention to this this is the most important through this we can make 99% of our websites so let's focus on this I hope you have understood this and you have understood it very well there is one more selector and it is called pseudo selector now what is pseudo selector suppose I have a link I will write universal selector universal selector universal selector universal selector what is happening why is it not working now what I will do I will write pseudo pseudo yes I know it is pseudo don't write in comments that it is pseudo not pneumonia I know it is silent so why did you write will happen if I do facebook2 yes I have not visited facebook2.com I have visited facebook.com if you remember in initial few lectures so I will show you two more selectors related to links one is
